(A1 → G).natural: If the company has authorization for the drug, then the facility is manufacturing authorized.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the company has authorization for the drug or the company has authorization for the device.

(A10 → (A9 ∨ G)).natural: Provided that the device passed the quality check, either the drug passed the quality check or the facility is manufacturing authorized.

(A11 ∨ A10).natural: The device requires recalibration or the device passed the quality check.

(A12 → A11).natural: Whenever the device is calibrated, the device requires recalibration.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: Either the device is calibrated or the device is faulty.

(A13 → A10).natural: Under the condition that the device is faulty, the device passed the quality check.

(A14 ∨ (A12 ∨ A13)).natural: Maintenance is scheduled for the device, or the device is calibrated, or the device is faulty.

(A17 → ¬A16).natural: If the system has a safety violation, then it is not the case that the system is operational.

(A18 → A17).natural: Provided that the system requires inspection, the system has a safety violation.

(A19 → A4).natural: Whenever the drug batch is released, the material is rejected.

(A19 ∨ A20).natural: Either the drug batch is released or the drug batch is quarantined.

(A2 → G).natural: If the company has authorization for the device, then the facility is manufacturing authorized.

(A20 → A5).natural: Under the condition that the drug batch is quarantined, the material requires testing.

(A21 ∨ (A19 ∨ A20)).natural: The drug is authorized for distribution, or the drug batch is released, or the drug batch is quarantined.

(A22 → A21).natural: If the drug is shipped, then the drug is authorized for distribution.

(A22 ∨ A23).natural: Either the drug is shipped or the drug is stored.

(A23 → (A19 ∨ A20)).natural: Provided that the drug is stored, either the drug batch is released or the drug batch is quarantined.

(A26 → A25).natural: Whenever the material requires documentation, the material is approved for production.

(A26 → A27).natural: If the material requires documentation, then the material meets specifications.

(A27 → A25).natural: Under the condition that the material meets specifications, the material is approved for production.

(A29 → A7).natural: If the drug packaging is approved, then the material is sterile.

(A29 ∨ A30).natural: Either the drug packaging is approved or the drug packaging is rejected.

(A3 → A24).natural: Provided that the material is approved, the material is compliant.

(A3 ∨ (A1 → G)).natural: The material is approved, or if the company has authorization for the drug, then the facility is manufacturing authorized.

(A30 → ¬A6).natural: Under the condition that the drug packaging is rejected, it is not the case that the material is contaminated.

(A7 ∨ ¬A6).natural: Either the material is sterile or the material is not contaminated.

(A8 → (A7 ∨ ¬A6)).natural: Provided that the material is production ready, either the material is sterile or the material is not contaminated.

(A9 ∨ G).natural: Either the drug passed the quality check or the facility is manufacturing authorized.

(¬(A3 → ¬A24) → A25).natural: If it is not the case that if the material is approved then the material is not compliant, then the material is approved for production.

(¬(A3 → ¬A24) → A26).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the material is approved then the material is not compliant, the material requires documentation.
